zombie_apocalypse.title: Zombie Apocalypse
zombie_apocalypse.setting: A small town overrun by the infected. Sirens, empty streets, boarded windows.
zombie_apocalypse.stakes: Stay alive, find safe shelter and basic supplies.
zombie_apocalypse.role: You and the AI are teammates trying to survive.

restaurant.title: Restaurant Roleplay
restaurant.setting: Busy casual restaurant at lunch. Noise, menus, line at counter.
restaurant.stakes: Order a meal you like and handle small problems politely.
restaurant.role: AI is a patient cashier; the user is the customer.
